name: T1047 Wmiprvse Wbemcomn DLL Hijack
description: Detects a threat actor creating a file named `wbemcomn.dll` in the `C:\Windows\System32\wbem\` directory over the network for a WMI DLL Hijack scenario.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Security AND (winlog.provider_name:Microsoft\-Windows\-Security\-Auditing AND event.code:5145 AND winlog.event_data.RelativeTargetName:*\\wbem\\wbemcomn.dll) AND (NOT (user.name:*$)))`
